content:
# We successfully harvested 10 coal, and our inventory now contains 1 stone furnace, 8 wood, 10 coal, and 5 stone.
# With coal in our inventory, we can now use the stone furnace to smelt iron ore or any other ores we may find.
# Next, we should locate some iron ore to begin smelting and producing iron plates.

iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the nearest iron ore resource patch
harvest_resource(iron_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 iron ore

print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
